item.title: Syntax testing
item.description: test Syntax test library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union # compute averages mtcars %>% group_by(cyl) %>% summarise(avg_mpg = mean(mpg, na.rm = T)) ## # A tibble: 3 x 2 ## cyl avg_mpg ## <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 4 26.7 ## 2 6 19.7 ## 3 8 15.
